item.title: [HBASE-2618] Don't inherit from HConstants
item.description: Can we stop using this idiom to inherit from HConstants? This is a known bad pattern and is recommended against in many places including Effective Java (item 17).

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
